pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Analysis for Neuroimaging Data // Several functions can be used to analyze neuroimaging data using multivariate methods based on the 'msma' package. The functions used in the book entitled "Multivariate Analysis for Neuroimaging Data" (2021, ISBN-13: 978-0367255329) are contained. Please also see Kawaguchi et al. (2017) doi:10.1093/biostatistics/kxx011 and Kawaguchi (2019) DOI:10.5772/intechopen.80531.
